House Bill/Resolution NO. HCR0005
FULL TITLE : CONCURRENT RESOLUTION CALLING CONGRESS TO CONVENE AS A CONSTITUENT ASSEMBLY FOR ONE (1) MONTH SOLELY TO PROPOSE SPECIFIC AMENDMENTS TO THE 1987 PHILIPPINE CONSTITUTION PARTICULARLY ARTICLE XVII THEREOF
ABSTRACT : Seeks to call Congress to convene as a Constituent Assembly for one (1) month solely to propose specific amendments to the 1987 Constitution, particularly Article XVII.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALMARIO, JOEL MAYO Z.
DATE FILED : 2016-08-01
